attributes.action: Charge a visitors road tax to foreign visitors using our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I suggest that when foreign drivers purchase their ferry ticket they should, at the same time, purchase a "visitors road tax disc" for a nominal fee of, say, £10.  The revenue created could help towards the cost of maintaining and building UK roads, many of which are currently in a very poor condition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
